# OpenClaw Terraform Provider

> Declarative configuration management for the OpenClaw AI gateway.

Terraform provider for OpenClaw â€” an AI gateway that connects chat platforms (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, iMessage, Google Chat) to AI coding agents.

Registry: registry.terraform.io/kylemclaren/openclaw

## Docs

- [Overview](https://openclaw-tf.vercel.app/docs)
- [Provider Configuration](https://openclaw-tf.vercel.app/docs/provider)

## Examples

- [Basic: Gateway with Two Channels](https://openclaw-tf.vercel.app/docs/examples/basic)
- [Multi-Agent: Channel-Based Routing](https://openclaw-tf.vercel.app/docs/examples/multi-agent)
- [Full-Stack: Every Resource Type](https://openclaw-tf.vercel.app/docs/examples/full-stack)
